name: Peanut Allergy
description: Allergy to peanuts. Peanuts are a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Shellfish Allergy (e.g., shrimp, lobster)
description: Allergy to shellfish (e.g., shrimp, lobster, crab, clams, mussels, oysters, scallops, octopus, squid, and snails). Shellfish are a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Milk Allergy (Dairy products)
description: Allergy to milk and dairy products. Milk is a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Egg Allergy
description: Allergy to eggs (e.g., chicken, duck, goose, quail). Eggs are a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Tree Nut Allergy (e.g., almonds, walnuts)
description: Allergy to tree nuts (e.g., almonds, walnuts, cashews, hazelnuts, macadamia nuts, pecans, pine nuts, pistachios, and Brazil nuts). Tree nuts are a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Wheat Allergy
description: Allergy to wheat and wheat products. Wheat is a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Penicillin Allergy
description: Allergy to penicillin antibiotics. Penicillin is a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Aspirin Allergy
description: Allergy to aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid). Aspirin is a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Local Anesthetics Allergy (e.g., Lidocaine)
description: Allergy to local anesthetics (e.g., lidocaine, bupivacaine, mepivacaine, prilocaine, ropivacaine, and tetracaine). Local anesthetics are a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Pollen Allergy (e.g., grass, ragweed)
description: Allergy to pollen (e.g., grass, ragweed, trees, and flowers). Pollen is a common allergen that can cause allergic rhinitis (hay fever) and asthma symptoms.

name: Dust Mite Allergy
description: Allergy to dust mites (e.g., Dermatophagoides pteronyssinus and Dermatophagoides farinae). Dust mites are a common allergen that can cause allergic rhinitis (hay fever) and asthma symptoms.

name: Mold Allergy
description: Allergy to mold spores (e.g., Alternaria, Aspergillus, Cladosporium, and Penicillium). Mold is a common allergen that can cause allergic rhinitis (hay fever) and asthma symptoms.

name: Cat Dander Allergy
description: Allergy to cat dander (skin flakes). Cat dander is a common allergen that can cause allergic rhinitis (hay fever) and asthma symptoms.

name: Dog Dander Allergy
description: Allergy to dog dander (skin flakes). Dog dander is a common allergen that can cause allergic rhinitis (hay fever) and asthma symptoms.

name: Latex Allergy
description: Allergy to latex rubber. Latex is a common allergen that can cause a severe allergic reaction (anaphylaxis). Anaphylaxis is a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment.

name: Nickel Allergy (common in jewelry or metal objects)
description: Allergy to nickel metal. Nickel is a common allergen that can cause allergic contact dermatitis (skin rash).

name: Perfume Allergy (fragrance sensitivity)
description: Allergy to perfume and fragrances. Perfume is a common allergen that can cause allergic contact dermatitis (skin rash).
